response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 to us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it could bring to you, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at this exclusive price. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 12000}
